question: Which scenario is true about the MVC framework?
choices: a. MVC compartmentalizes roles by using shared data with a Model View
b. MVC makes development faster by having requests handled straight to the View
c. MVC secures the application with a Controller View separated from the Model
d. All of the above
e. None of the above

question: Which of the following best describes data abstraction in classes?
choices: a. An object Car is obscured to a user via data firewall
b. An object Car is made visible to an inheritor Lamborghini via a public class attribute using { Get; }
c. An object Car is obscured to an inheriting class by separating Model and ViewModels
d. All of the above.
e. None of the above.

question: What are the common tests performed on APIs?
choices: a. Verification of the API whether it correctly updates the view
b. Verify if the API returns the correct HTTP verb
c. Based on input conditions, check that returned values wrap the correct HTTP verb
d. All of the above
e. None of the above

question: Which statement is not true about API endpoints?
choices: a. Having two endpoints (i.e. /employees) is invalid and will result to a conflict. Different nouns are required for each endpoint
b. A DELETE method on an endpoint (i.e. /employees/10) will, in standard practice, delete employee 10
c. A DELETE method on an endpoint (i.e. /employees/10) will, in standard practice, delete the top 10 employees on db
d. Both A and B
e. Both A and C

question: Which of the following statements is accurate?
choices: a. Authentication checks identity. Authorization checks resources/actions allowed for identified requestor.
b. Authentication checks identity and authorizes use of resources
c. Authentication checks identity. Authorization re-checks identity and then checks authority to use resources
d. All of the above
e. None of the above
